title: Tech's Bear Market: What to Buy - and Avoid
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Alex Eule discuss the outlook for Apple, Zoom Media Communications, and other tech companies as a bear market grips the Nasdaq.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
